title: YouTube Scout – Find the Next Big Thing
job_overview:
We're Lost Astronaut VC -  a global venture fund investing in the hidden talent of tomorrow. We don’t care about résumés or fancy degrees - we care about people who build.

Your mission?
Scout YouTube daily and send us creators or entrepreneurs with under 10k subscribers who are doing something unique, useful, or brilliant. Think: people making indie tools, sharing business ideas, or quietly building the next big thing.

You’ll:

Watch YouTube videos and find promising creators/founders
Write 1–2 sentences on why you think each one is interesting
Do anything extra if you feel like it, we will pay for it if its valuable, this position is very flexible.

No fancy skills needed  just:

Common sense
Solid English
Heavy YouTube usage

This is a long-term opportunity with bonuses if we invest in someone you discover. You’ll be part of a global scouting team looking for the undiscovered astronauts of the startup world
